content: create your own functional and stylish treasure chest storage basket with this free crochet pattern this pattern is perfect for storing your yarn hooks and notions while adding a personal touch to your craft space the pattern is made with lion brand 24/7 yarn for durability and a sleek finish it includes 3 video tutorials to guide you through the process ensuring you create a basket you ll love whether you re organizing your crochet tools or adding a cute home decor piece this basket is perfect for all your storage needs originally featured as a mystery cal this pattern also includes crochet tips throughout to help you improve your skills as you go whether you re making it for yourself or gifting it to a fellow maker this basket is both pretty and practical skill level easy/beginner finished size 7 5 w x 5 l x 6 5 h inches includes 3 video tutorials yarn worsted yarn ***skill*** advanced beginner ***this pattern uses us crochet terms*** perfect for crochet storage craft room decor gifts for crocheters market prep and more the pattern is free with ads on my website 1 > but you can also purchase the ad-free > printer-friendly pdf here on ravelry > this pattern can also be found in my > crochet membership which includes over > 500 patterns and 100s of video > tutorials you can join the membership > here 2 you can also find the pattern in this 40-pattern basket ebook with 50+ videos here 3 1 https //www nickishomemadecrafts com/crochet-treasure-chest-pattern/ 2 https //www nickishomemadecrafts com/crochet/the-crochet-club/ 3 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/crochet-basket-made-easy/ ref=ravelry
